description: This file declares APIs for the DeviceInfo object in a data model library, including functions to get and set boolean and string parameters related to device information. It defines function prototypes used for interacting with device data fields, supporting operations like retrieval and modification within a larger system.

methods.name: DeviceInfo_GetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Retrieves a boolean parameter value associated with Device.DeviceInfo in the data model.

methods.name: DeviceInfo_GetParamStringValue
methods.description: Retrieves a string parameter value associated with Device.DeviceInfo in the data model.

methods.name: DeviceInfo_SetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Sets a boolean parameter value associated with Device.DeviceInfo.

methods.name: DeviceInfo_SetParamStringValue
methods.description: Sets a string parameter value associated with Device.DeviceInfo.
